mapper.insert:
select t_house_other_seq.NEXTVAL from dual
INSERT INTO t_house_other ( id , identity_info_id , applicant_type , political_status , soldier_meritorious , culture_degree , degree , profession , company_name , job_title , job_content , company_address , company_phone , self_phone , application_date , social_security_pay , provident_fund , taxes , detention , penalty , awards_title , c_time , apply_office_address, isAnotherInsurance,isApplyRegiste,isInsurance,isSpouseInsurance, penaltyDate, penaltyContent, penaltyResults, socialSecurityType, dispatch, industry, jobDate ) VALUES ( ${id} , #{identityInfoId, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{applicantType, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{politicalStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{soldierMeritorious, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{cultureDegree, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{degree, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{profession, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{companyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{jobTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{jobContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{companyAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{companyPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{selfPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{applicationDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{socialSecurityPay, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{providentFund, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{taxes, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{detention, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{penalty, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{awardsTitle, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{ctime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyOfficeAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isAnotherInsurance, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{isApplyRegiste, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{isInsurance, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{isSpouseInsurance, jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{penaltyDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{penaltyContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{penaltyResults, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{socialSecurityType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{dispatch, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{industry, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{jobDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_house_other SET identity_info_id = #{identityInfoId, jdbcType=INTEGER} , applicant_type = #{applicantType, jdbcType=INTEGER} , political_status = #{politicalStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} , soldier_meritorious = #{soldierMeritorious, jdbcType=INTEGER} , culture_degree = #{cultureDegree, jdbcType=INTEGER} , degree = #{degree, jdbcType=INTEGER} , profession = #{profession, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , company_name = #{companyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , job_title = #{jobTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , job_content = #{jobContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , company_address = #{companyAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , apply_office_address = #{applyOfficeAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , company_phone = #{companyPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , self_phone = #{selfPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , application_date = #{applicationDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , social_security_pay = #{socialSecurityPay, jdbcType=INTEGER} , provident_fund = #{providentFund, jdbcType=INTEGER} , taxes = #{taxes, jdbcType=INTEGER} , detention = #{detention, jdbcType=INTEGER} , penalty = #{penalty, jdbcType=INTEGER} , awards_title = #{awardsTitle, jdbcType=INTEGER} , c_time = #{ctime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , isAnotherInsurance = #{isAnotherInsurance, jdbcType=INTEGER} , isApplyRegiste = #{isApplyRegiste, jdbcType=INTEGER} , isInsurance = #{isInsurance, jdbcType=INTEGER} , isSpouseInsurance = #{isSpouseInsurance, jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
penaltyDate = #{penaltyDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , penaltyContent = #{penaltyContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , penaltyResults = #{penaltyResults, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , socialSecurityType = #{socialSecurityType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , dispatch = #{dispatch, jdbcType=INTEGER} , industry = #{industry, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , jobDate = #{jobDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , id = #{id} WHERE id = #{id}
